TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a movie title and describe the new movie in a single line

Articles.Content:
Apollo 8: a Mun Miison (he he)

 

Inter Stelar: A film about spelling interstellar right

Iro Man : A man in Copper
Kun fury: Movie about furious raccoon
The Vengers: ?
Teenae Mutat Nina Turles
The Lintstones: In this live-action documentary, Barney and Fred, hosts of "Your Dryer, Your Life" take a look at the hazardous consequences of not cleaning your filters.
PongeBob Squarepants  A story about a  sponge on drugs.
Idiana Johns: A little story about Idiana
Moo : A solitary cow mines ore in a remote location but all is not as it seems

The Wof of Wall Street: This guy starts giving out fresh waffles on Wall Street, and the police try to kick him out because there is no more Christmas Spirit. The waffle man is the only one who can turn the keys save Christmas!

Edited June 10, 2016 by cubinator
Rat ace: Movie about rats who play poker

All street - a movie about a road and everyone that lives on it.
Goo will hunting -  A blob of goo and it's quest to obtain it's farthers last will and testement
Black hawk own - A predator bird holds a small community in fear
No country for old me - The shocking story of pension fund fraud.
Fining Dory - A documentry on how to fillet fish
Froze - a womans last hours on earth in an alaskan winter.
X-Men: First Lass  - A 2 hour interview with Jenefier Lawrence
Hansel & Gretek: Itch hunters - Massage parlor exposé
Enter the Drago: Take a look inside the antagonist from an 80's boxing movie.
Pirates of X Century: Movie about medieval pirates (Pirates of XX century: it's soviet most popular movie)

The Hunger Game: Hungry Hungry Hippos, upgraded.

The Maize Runner: A fight to the death... with corn!

(Note: I know this adds a letter, but it's just too funny not to add)

Edited June 11, 2016 by spacebrick3

The Martin: A guy named Martin grows potatoes.  The end.

Jurassic Par: A bunch of dinosaurs get together and play golf.

: well it's a movie about a movie in one letter and without wich reappear while disapearing may be a movie with no title no poster but lot of content ; )

Edited June 12, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
Kill Ill: a movie about a doctor trying to cure the terminal illness that took her husband by individually curing each genome
Untoppable: A movie where Denzel Washington tries many methods to put cake toppers on and fails.
M Before You: You are James Bond, who must explain to a Bond girl that you love your boss, M, instead of her. Shot in the style of a Choose-your-own-Adventure.

Itch Black: You are a prisoner on a interplanetary transport ship and you notice a small itchy spot in the pit under your left arm... (Pitch Black)

Lost Word: A movie about a bunch of scrabble players locked in a game until they can figure out who had their turn skipped. (Lost World)

Edited June 12, 2016 by adsii1970

Odzilla  
A movie about a socially awkward radioactive dinosaur....

he Right Stuff: A story about a writer who didn't understand grammar or capitalization, or spelling.

The Right Stuff

Edited June 12, 2016 by Andem
A Tip to the Moon

The Flying Sauce:  your typical B-grade teen movie about a food fight in an Italian restaurant.

When Words Collide:  fights break out during a Scrabble contest regarding the use of the blank tile.

Hem! :  Pants, and those who repair them...

Santa Claus conquers The Martian:  Matt Damon stars in a cheesy retro-70's BDSM flick...

Das bot. Movie about secret robot from germany
